title: Open a Custodial Account (UTMA/UGMA)
description: A client wants to open an investment account for their minor child.

tasks.description: Explain the features and rules of a custodial account to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains that the gift is irrevocable and the child gets control at the age of majority.

tasks.description: Collect the required information for both the custodian (the client) and the minor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures all personal details for both individuals.

tasks.description: Create the new custodial account in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully opens the new UTMA account.
